title: Share of non-performing loans held by banks in the U.S. 1995 to 2019
yAxis: Share of non-performing loans in total loans
summary: In general Share of non-performing loans in total loans has rose over the Year.
Share of non-performing loans in total loans is slightly increasing from '08 to '09, and finally roughly constant from '09 to '12.
The line rapidly increased by 112.67% from Year '08 to '09.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year '08 and '09.
Maximum Share of non-performing loans in total loans, about 5.3 was reported at Year '10
Minimum Share of non-performing loans in total loans about 2.21 was reached at Year '08
min_summary: Overall Share of non-performing loans in total loans has increased over the Year.
Share of non-performing loans in total loans is slightly increasing from '08 to '09, and finally roughly constant from '09 to '12.
mid_summary: Overall Share of non-performing loans in total loans has increased over the Year.
